index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Pike Place Urban Renewal Project, Project No. Wash R-17; authorizing the application for and agreement with the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development for supplemental financial assistance (Urgent Needs Discretionary Fund) for the close-out of said project, making an appropriation from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund and amending the Project Budget.
